tags: TBIPS Application/Software Architect Level 3 with Assyst Expertise
full_summary:
**TBIPS Application/Software Architect Level 3 with Assyst Expertise**
================================

**Tender Details**

*   **Reference Number**: cb-4422-62269394
*   **Solicitation Number**: 30003694
*   **Publication Date**: March 23, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 24, 2023, 2:00 pm Eastern Time (ET)
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Details**

*   **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Category**: Service
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
*   **Region of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Project Description**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invites applicants for a TBIPS (Temporary Billable IT Professional Services) Application/Software Architect Level 3 to assist the DFO technical team in implementing a module called IT Operations Management (ITOM) within DFO's IT Service Management Solution, ASSYST. The work includes, but is not limited to, the development, support, and maintenance of the tool.

**Selection Criteria**

The selection criteria for this procurement are based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or clarifications regarding this tender, please contact Stephanie Patry at (343) 576-8973 or stephanie.patry@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents**

The tender documents can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). You will need to create an account to access the documents. The documents are available in English and French.

Note: The tender closing date has been expired; therefore, no application will be accepted at this time. For future reference, please be aware of the competitive tendering process and requirements for future tenders. Best of luck!
